URLs Documentation
==================

This section provides an overview of the URL configurations for each app in the Business Manager project.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

.. note::
   The following are general descriptions of the URL modules. For detailed API references, please see the respective
   module documentations.

---------

   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :no-index:
